author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Leon for "webtools doesn't treat "Date" field properly" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4847
If an entity field type is "Date" (YYYY-MM-DD), in edit or create form of webtools, the component of this field is redered as "timestamp".
Update the ViewGeneric.ftl to change the related "shortDateInput" from false to true resolves this problem.
